name: Grace on the Hill Food Pantry
description: Food pantry and community outreach ministry operated by Grace on the Hill Community Church. Provides food distribution and household items to families in need through Grace Place and The ARK store. Offers $150-$200 worth of groceries per family each week, along with clothing and household items. Serves the impoverished communities of Appalachia with no-strings-attached assistance. Food distribution takes place on Tuesday mornings.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online sources
hours: Food distribution: Tuesdays 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM; Registration: Mondays 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM
services: Food distribution, household items, clothing, community outreach, registration assistance
eligibility: Families in need in the Corbin area and surrounding communities
notes: Operated by Grace on the Hill Community Church. Families must go through a registration process. Also operates The ARK store for clothing and household items. Contact Margaret Mills for more information.
